description: Raise an error if an incomplete profile is found (`issue 690 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/690>`__)
Add a ``--no-sign-request`` option that, when specified, will not sign any requests.
Added ``-source-region`` argument to allow transfer between non DNS compatible buckets that were located in different regions. (`issue 872 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/872>`__)
